items.content_html: ShareIt is a lightweight, cross-platform file sharing tool that facilitates quick and easy file transfers between devices on the same network. By compressing files into a single .zip archive and serving them via an HTTP server, ShareIt streamlines the process of sharing files in a terminal-friendly manner.
